item.title: Programming Growth Plan
item.description:
I have committed to growing my programming skills by regular practice. This page tracks my progress.

Week 9 - September 30th, 2017

  • Python Crash Course - chapter: 11

Week 8 - September 23rd, 2017

  • Python Crash Course - chapter: 9
  • Georgia Tech CS1301x - Introduction to Computing using Python - chapters:
    • 5.1

Week 7 - September 16th, 2017

  • Python Crash Course - chapter: 10
  • Georgia Tech CS1301x - Introduction to Computing using Python - chapters:
    • 4.3
    • 4.4
    • 4.5

Week 6 - September 9th, 2017

  • Georgia Tech CS1301x - Introduction to Computing using Python - chapters:
    • 4.2

Week 5 - September 2nd, 2017

I reached my goal this week by completing the following:

  • Python Crash Course - chapters: 7, 8
  • Georgia Tech CS1301x - Introduction to Computing using Python - chapters:
    • 3.3
    • 3.4
    • 3.5
    • 4.1

Week 4 - August 26th, 2017

I reached my goal this week by completing the following:

  • Georgia Tech CS1301x - Introduction to Computing using Python - chapters:
    • 1.2
    • 1.3
    • 2.1
    • 2.2
    • 2.3
    • 2.4
    • 3.1
    • 3.2

Week 3 - August 19th, 2017

I reached my goal this week by completing the following:

  • Python Crash Course - chapter: 6
  • Georgia Tech CS1301x - Introduction to Computing using Python - chapter: 1.1

Week 2 - August 12th, 2017

I reached my goal this week by completing the following:

  • Python Crash Course - chapters: 4-5
  • Codewars - kata: 1
  • freeCodeCamp - challenges: 15

Week 1 - August 5th, 2017

I reached my goal this week by completing the following:

  • Python Crash Course - chapters: 1-3
  • Codewars - kata: 4
  • freeCodeCamp - challenges: 21
